response.message: "Best of Breed"? Oh God. The VC money has already gotten to him. I draw the line at synergy.

"the best web chat software I’ve ever seen or used"

I love BOLD statements. Makes me wanna go chat :)

“the best web chat software I’ve ever seen or used”

Makes me want to throw up.
That chat feature is good, but not *that* good.
@configurator if You can do better, do it. Personally I think it's pretty fracking awesome. I just cringe when people use corporate buzzwords like 'best of breed'.

Hello? I think Jeff uses corporate language ironically as always?

This thing about "the third place" leaves me a bit cold though. I've tried it a couple of times but I've never found anything interesting going on. I merely see the point. But maybe it's just me? Is it being successful?

Having said that, I agree that it seems really nicely implemented.

"Area 51 — our new Q&A site creation zone"

Has the word "new" changed its definition since the last time I've checked? Area 51 has been out for a while now
